member.name: M:eFormCore.ICore.CaseCreate(eFormData.MainElement,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to create an eForm case(s) in the Microting local DB, and creates it in the Microting system
member.param: The templat MainElement the case(s) will be based on
NEEDS TO BE UNIQUE IF ASSIGNED. The unique identifier that you can assign yourself to the set of case(s)
siteId that the case will be sent to

member.name: M:eFormCore.ICore.CaseCreate(eFormData.MainElement,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Tries to create an eForm case(s) in the Microting local DB, and creates it in the Microting system, with extended parameters
member.param: The templat MainElement the case(s) will be based on

NEEDS TO BE UNIQUE IF ASSIGNED. The unique identifier that you can assign yourself to the set of case(s). If used (not blank or null), the cases are connected. Meaning that if one is completed, all in the set is retracted. If you wish to use caseUId and not have the cases connected, use this method multiple times, each with a unique caseUId
List of siteIds that case(s) will be sent to
Custom extended parameter

member.name: M:eFormCore.ICore.CaseCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to retrieve the status of a case
member.param: Microting ID of the eForm case

member.name: M:eFormCore.ICore.CaseRead(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to retrieve the answered full case from the DB
member.param: Microting ID of the eForm case
If left empty, "0" or NULL it will try to retrieve the first check. Alternative is stating the Id of the specific check wanted to retrieve

member.name: M:eFormCore.ICore.CasesToExcel(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to retrieve all connected cases to a templat, and delivers them as a Excel fil, at the returned path's location
member.param: The templat's ID to be used. Null will remove this limit
Only cases from after this time limit. Null will remove this limit
Only cases from before this time limit. Null will remove this limit
Location where fil is to be placed, along with fil name. No extension needed. Relative or absolut. WARNING: Excel might use its default location

Only cases from after this time limit. Null will remove this limit
Only cases from before this time limit. Null will remove this limit
Location where fil is to be placed, along with fil name. No extension needed. Relative or absolut
